name: The Angry Cannon
description:
Use the unique powers of the Angry Cannon to shoot and destroy the nasty birds!   The survival of the Angry Cannon is at stake. Dish out revenge on the birds but not all of them will get you points! Shoot very carefully as each bullet shot will cost you one coin and avoid being hit. Three hits and it is game over.

Green bird - Plus 2 points
Blue bird - Plus 5 points
Yellow bird - Plus 10 points
Red bird - Plus 20 points

Angry Cannons features challenging physics-based gameplay and hours of replay value. If you get stuck in the game, you can purchase coins from the coin store. You can also unlock different kinds of cannons to shoot with.
